description.en: Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNOdayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.

shlokas:
balaM rUpaM yazO dharmaM jJAnamAyuH sukhaM dhRtim.
ArOgyaM paramApnOti samyak snAnEna mAnavaH..
